title: Report on my trip to San Fran to see Jordan Peterson
description:
I attended the "Simulation" event where Jordan Peterson spoke. A number of you asked for a report, here it is. 

We're having a "meet-up" of Jordan Peterson fans on Wednesday evening Feb 21 2018. If you're available and close we'd love to see you.

Here's the video from the event. https://youtu.be/8sSe6FSrylc
